title: Framer for Developers
text:
Framer for Developers
Framer for Developers
Our developer features empowers you to extend Framerâ€™s capabilities with standard React and Javascript. Get started with our docs and guides below.
Plugins
Build small apps that can interact with the Framer Editor and CMS.
Fetch
Building API endpoints that designers can use on their Framer sites without code.
Code Components
Custom React Components with visual controls to render anything on your site.
Code Overrides
Higher Order Components to modify Layer and Component properties.
